description: A hwIpfpmLossRatioExceed trap is sent when the loss ratio
of IPFPM test instance exceeds the uppper threshold in
continuous five test intervals.

event.Summary: IPFPM loss ratio exceeded threshold for 5 intervals

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmLossRatioExceed HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpFlowType i 0 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpForwardLossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpBackwardLossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpInstDesc s EXAMPLE

description: The object indicates the flow that the ACH monitors is
'forward(1)' or 'backward(2)', 'bidirectional(3)'. The value none(0) represents that it is not configured.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpFlowType

description: This value divided by 1000000 is the loss ratio(%) of forward flow measurement.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpForwardLossRatio

description: This value divided by 1000000 is the loss ratio(%) of backward flow measurement.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpBackwardLossRatio

description: Description of the test instance.
if the string length is 0, it represents that it is not configured.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpInstDesc

description: A hwIpfpmLossRatioRecovery trap is sent when the loss ratio
of IPFPM test instance is under the lower threshold in
continuous five test intervals.

event.Summary: IPFPM loss ratio recovered in 5 intervals

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmLossRatioRecovery HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpFlowType i 0 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpForwardLossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpBackwardLossRatio i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpInstDesc s EXAMPLE

description: The object indicates the flow that the ACH monitors is
'forward(1)' or 'backward(2)', 'bidirectional(3)'. The value none(0) represents that it is not configured.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpFlowType

description: This value divided by 1000000 is the loss ratio(%) of forward flow measurement.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpForwardLossRatio

description: This value divided by 1000000 is the loss ratio(%) of backward flow measurement.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpBackwardLossRatio

description: Description of the test instance.
if the string length is 0, it represents that it is not configured.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpInstDesc

description: A hwIpfpmOneDelayExceed trap is sent when the one-way delay
of IPFPM test instance exceeds the uppper threshold in
continuous five test intervals.

event.Summary: One-way delay exceeded threshold for 5 intervals

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmOneDelayExceed HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpFlowType i 0 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpForwardOneDelay i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpBackwardOneDelay i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpInstDesc s EXAMPLE

description: The object indicates the flow that the ACH monitors is
'forward(1)' or 'backward(2)', 'bidirectional(3)'. The value none(0) represents that it is not configured.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpFlowType

description: The one-way delay(us) of forward flow.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpForwardOneDelay

description: The one-way delay(us) of backward flow.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpBackwardOneDelay

description: Description of the test instance.
if the string length is 0, it represents that it is not configured.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpInstDesc

description: A hwIpfpmOneDelayRecovery trap is sent when the one-way delay
of IPFPM test instance is under the lower threshold in
continuous five test intervals.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmOneDelayRecovery HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpFlowType i 0 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpForwardOneDelay i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpBackwardOneDelay i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpInstDesc s EXAMPLE

description: The object indicates the flow that the ACH monitors is
'forward(1)' or 'backward(2)', 'bidirectional(3)'. The value none(0) represents that it is not configured.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpFlowType

description: A hwIpfpmTwoDelayExceed trap is sent when the two-way delay
of IPFPM test instance exceeds the uppper threshold in
continuous five test intervals.

event.Summary: Two-way delay exceeded threshold for 5 intervals

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTwoDelayExceed HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpTwoDelay i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpInstDesc s EXAMPLE

description: The two-way delay(us) of monitored flow.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpTwoDelay

description: Description of the test instance.
if the string length is 0, it represents that it is not configured.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpInstDesc

description: A hwIpfpmTwoDelayRecovery trap is sent when the two-way delay
of IPFPM test instance is under the lower threshold in
continuous five test intervals.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTwoDelayRecovery HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpTwoDelay i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpInstDesc s EXAMPLE

description: The two-way delay(us) of monitored flow.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpTwoDelay

description: Description of the test instance.
if the string length is 0, it represents that it is not configured.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpInstDesc

description: A hwIpfpmDcpFlowConflict trap is sent when the flow
configuration conflicts with another existing flow configuration.
The first hwIpfpmDcpInstId and hwIpfpmDcpFlowType indicates the specified flow.
The second hwIpfpmDcpInstId and hwIpfpmDcpFlowType indicates the existing flow.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmDcpFlowConflict HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmDcpInstId i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmDcpFlowType i 0 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmDcpInstId i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmDcpFlowType i 0

description: Identification of the test instance.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmDcpInstId

description: This object indicates that the flow is 'forward(1)' or
'backward(2)' or 'bidirectional(3)'.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmDcpFlowType

description: Identification of the test instance.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmDcpInstId

description: This object indicates that the flow is 'forward(1)' or
'backward(2)' or 'bidirectional(3)'.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmDcpFlowType

description: A hwIpfpmTlpExceed trap is sent when the number of board tlp exceeds the threshold.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpExceed HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpExceedBoardId i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpNumber i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpThreshold i 9999

description: The board ID that the tlp exceed the threshold.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpExceedBoardId

description: The number of tlp.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpNumber

description: The threshold of tlp.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpThreshold

description: A hwIpfpmTlpRecovery trap is sent when the number of board tlp is under the threshold.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpRecovery HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpExceedBoardId i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpNumber i 9999 HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpThreshold i 9999

description: The board ID that the tlp exceed the threshold.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpExceedBoardId

description: The number of tlp.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpNumber

description: The threshold of tlp.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmTlpThreshold

description: A hwIpfpmMultiOneDelayExceed trap is sent when the one-way delay
of IPFPM test instance exceeds the uppper threshold in
continuous five test intervals. This trap supports multi one-way delay for a period.

event.Summary: One-way delay exceeded threshold for 5 intervals

description: The multi-in-point one-way delay(us).
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpOneDelayMulti

description: A hwIpfpmMultiOneDelayRecovery trap is sent when the one-way delay
of IPFPM test instance is under the lower threshold in
continuous five test intervals.
The multi-in-point one-way delay(us).
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpOneDelayMulti

description: A hwIpfpmMultiTwoDelayExceed trap is sent when the two-way delay
of IPFPM test instance exceeds the uppper threshold in
continuous five test intervals. This trap supports multi two-way delay for a period.

event.Summary: Multi two-way delay exceeded threshold for 5 intervals

description: The multi-in-point two-way delay(us) of monitored flow.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpTwoDelayMulti

description: A hwIpfpmMultiTwoDelayRecovery trap is sent when the two-way delay
of IPFPM test instance is under the lower threshold in
continuous five test intervals.
The multi-in-point two-way delay(us) of monitored flow.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IPFPM-MIB::hwIpfpmMcpTwoDelayMulti
